oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Porgy and Bess" Program
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; Jessye, Eva; musical theater; entertainment;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Program for "Porgy and Bess" with Eva Jessye listed as the choral director. Her photograph is signed, "To my leading soprano fondly with memory of Hallelujah, Eva Jessye."
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Trachtman Theatrical Publishing Co., Phila, Pa
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
